title: Quiet hiring: the fast track to career success – or catastrophic burnout?

The culmination to Netflix's most iconic show won't be seen until some point in mid to late 2025, presumably by which point all the cute kids we fell in love with back in 2016 will have beer bellies, five o'clock shadows and repeat prescriptions for osteoporosis medication. The better news is that Stranger Things has...

title: Pennsylvania town aims for normality as police feel heat over Trump shooting
content: Three days after Donald Trump came close to being assassinated by a sniper's bullet, the town of Butler, Pennsylvania, was attempting to return to normality as questions continue to swirl about security lapses that preceded the shooting. It is now believed that Thomas Crooks, the 20-year-old suspect, was spotted by law enforcement officials on the roof of a glass research company at 5.45pm, nearly 30 minutes before shots were fired that injured Trump, killed a former fire chief and injured two...

title: Elon Musk says X and SpaceX will move from California to Texas
From pruning to reforesting – how good agricultural practices can lift cocoa communities
content: In Côte d'Ivoire and Ghana, farmers are already seeing the increasing impact of climate change. Higher temperatures, less regular rainfall and extended periods of drought are leading to a lower crop yield and, in turn, a lower income. Yet for more than a hundred years, cocoa has been an important crop for smallholder farms across western Africa. Today, around 70% of the world's chocolate comes from small, privately owned cocoa farms in Côte d'Ivoire, Ghana, Cameroon and Nigeria, where local...

title: Three days after attempted assassination, Trump shooter remains an elusive enigma
creator: By MICHAEL BIESECKER, MARTHA BELLISLE, JIM MUSTIAN and PETER SMITH - Associated Press
content: BETHEL PARK, Pa. (AP) — After three days, an enigmatic portrait emerged of the 20-year-old man who came close to killing former President Donald Trump with a high-velocity bullet: He was an intelligent loner with few friends, an apparently thin social media footprint and no hints of strong political beliefs that would suggest a motive for an attempted assassination . Even after the FBI cracked into Thomas Matthew Crooks' cellphone, scoured his computer, home and car, and interviewed more than...

title: World News | Archeologists Find Musket Balls Fired During 1 of the First Battles in the Revolutionary War
content: Concord (US), Jul 17 (AP) Nearly 250 years ago, hundreds of militiamen lined a hillside in Massachusetts and started firing a barrage of musket balls toward retreating British troops, marking the first major battle in the Revolutionary War. The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. creator: Business Insider
content: The Dow Jones climbed over 700 basis points on Tuesday. Small-caps saw a steeper increase as rate-cut bets helped drive a rotation into other parts of the market. Retail sales also encouraged investors, diminishing fears of a consumer spending pullback. US equities soared on Tuesday as the bull market swept into broader corners of the market. While the Dow Jones jumped 1.8% to a new record high, the Russell 2000, an index focused on small-caps, notched an even steeper gain of 3.5%. The rotation...

content: New Delhi, Jul 17 (PTI) Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd on Wednesday said it has received final approval from the US health regulator for its generic Topiramate capsules used to treat certain types of seizure. The approval by the US Food & Drug Administration (USFDA) is for Topiramate capsules of strengths 15 mg and 25 mg, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals said in a statement. title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
content: Nearly 250 years ago, hundreds of militiamen lined a hillside in Massachusetts and started firing a barrage of musket balls toward retreating British troops, marking the first major battle in the Revolutionary War. The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. Early analysis of the balls — gray with sizes ranging from a pea to a marble — indicates colonial militia members fired them...

title: Former Registrar Suryadevara Prasanna Kumar appointed as Secretary General to Andhra Pradesh Legislature
creator: Express News Service
content: VIJAYAWADA: Supreme Court former Registrar Suryadevara Prasanna Kumar has been appointed as Secretary General to Andhra Pradesh State Legislature on contract basis. AP Legislature Joint Secretary PV Subba Reddy issued orders to this effect on Tuesday. Prasanna Kumar’s term of office as the Secretary General to AP State Legislature will be initially for a period of three years from the date of assumption of charge. The vacancy was caused following the resignation of incumbent PPK Ramacharyulu....

title: World News | Global Rights Group Finds Hamas-led Militants Committed War Crimes on Oct. 7
content: Tel Aviv (Israel), Jul 17 (AP) Hamas-led armed groups committed numerous war crimes during the Oct. 7 attack on southern Israel that precipitated the ongoing war in the Gaza Strip, according to a global human rights group report released Wednesday. Human Rights Watch said the acts of the Palestinian fighters, who killed around 1,200 people and kidnapped more than 250 during the attack, met the international legal definition for crimes against humanity and war crimes. title: Most birds avoid hurricanes. This species chases them, scientists say.
creator: Kyle Melnick
content: A rare seabird that lives on an uninhabited Atlantic Ocean island has an unusual response to hurricanes, new research shows: They fly toward the storms, rather than away from them. It is unusual behavior for birds, which typically avoid hurricanes by flying around them or hiding to protect themselves from strong winds. But biologist Francesco Ventura found that not only are Desertas petrels — pigeon-size seabirds with gray wings and black beaks — unbothered by the storms, they also see them as...

content: WASHINGTON (AP) — A judge's stunning decision to dismiss the classified documents case against Donald Trump brought an abrupt halt to what experts have considered the strongest and most straightforward of the prosecutions of the former president. content: IT is a desperate move that may bring down the entire edifice. The plan to ban the most popular political party in the country is the most senseless, self-destructive action the government can take. It is nothing short of hara-kiri. Whether or not the decision is implemented, its very announcement has jolted the foundations of the existing political power structure. The ruling coalition is already in tatters. It was quite a spectacle as a frothing, fumbling federal information minister...

title: 13 Indians among 16 crew missing after oil tanker sinks off Oman coast
content: Dubai: Thirteen Indians are among the 16-member crew of a Comoros-flagged oil tanker that went missing after it capsized off the coast of Oman, the country’s maritime authority said. The tanker capsized 25 nautical miles southeast of Ras Madrakah in the Wilayat of Duqm, and a search and rescue operation was activated in coordination with the concerned authorities, Oman’s Maritime Security Centre said in a post on X on Monday. The crew of ‘Prestige Falcon’ included 13 Indians and 3 Sri Lankans,...

creator: The Canadian Press
content: LONDON (AP) — King Charles III will officially open the new session of Parliament on Wednesday, donning his ceremonial robes and the crown of state to deliver a speech laying out the legislative program of the U.K.’s . title: Alex Albon Overlooks His Own Team to Name Michael Schumacher’s Title-Winning Car as His Dream Car
creator: Vidit Dhawan
content: Alex Albon drives for Williams, a team that has produced multiple Championship-winning cars in the past. title: Armed man killed while approaching Republican National Convention in US
content: MILWAUKEE — Five Ohio police officers who were in Milwaukee, the United States , to assist with security at the Republican National Convention fired shots at a man in a residential neighbourhood Tuesday afternoon, killing him, officials said. The man was holding a knife in each hand and charging at another person when the officers from Columbus, Ohio, intervened, authorities said. The shooting took place about 1 mile (1.6 kilometres) from the Fiserv Forum, where the convention has been underway...

content: In recent times, it has often felt like football never stops. content: The Chicago White Sox will sign veteran Nick Senzel on Tuesday, reports Jon Heyman of the New York Post. Per James Fegan of Sox Machine , Senzel will sign a major league deal. The veteran will likely join the team immediately following the All-Star break on Friday. The Washington Nationals released Senzel in mid-July after he struggled to perform this year. title: HSBC appoints Georges Elhedery as group chief executive
creator: Reuters
content: (Reuters) -HSBC Holdings Ltd said on Wednesday it has appointed Georges Elhedery as its group chief executive, with effect from Sept. 2. Elhedery, who joined HSBC in 2005, is the current chief financial officer and will replace outgoing head Noel Quinn in September. Quinn, who lead the global lender for five years, will remain CEO until his successor starts in the role, and has agreed to remain available through to the end of his 12-month notice period expiring on April 30, 2025. Elhedery...

title: HSBC appoints Georges Elhedery as group chief executive
creator: Reuters
content: (Reuters) -HSBC Holdings Plc said on Wednesday it appointed Georges Elhedery as its group chief executive, with effect from Sept. 2, making him the third CEO in less than eight years for the global lender. Elhedery is the current chief financial officer and will replace outgoing head Noel Quinn in September. Since 2020, Elhedery had been the co-head of the Global Banking and Markets business, the division that houses HSBC's trading and investment banking advisory businesses. Lebanon-born...

title: The fantastic world of Kashi
creator: Hriday Ranjan
content: BENGALURU: I watched the movie Kalki 2928 AD and was fascinated by the world they created. title: 'I can't breathe': Eric Garner remembered on the 10th anniversary of his chokehold death
creator: KAREN MATTHEWS
content: NEW YORK — Wednesday marks 10 years since the death of Eric Garner at the hands of New York City police officers made ''I can't breathe'' a rallying cry. Bystander video showed Garner gasping the phrase while locked in a police chokehold and spurred Black Lives Matter protests in New York and across the country. More demonstrations followed weeks later when Michael Brown, an 18-year-old Black man, was fatally shot by a police officer in Ferguson, Missouri, on Aug. 9, 2014. Six years later,...

title: World Emoji Day: How emoticons inspire homegrown artists and creators
creator: Mid-day
content: Spinning a yarn ADVERTISEMENT As a corporate employee in a Big 4 audit firm, I started crocheting on my mother’s insistence to relieve stress. Eventually, I left my job to pursue crocheting full-time. What began as a stress buster is now my happiness, and my business. My artworks are inspired from the things we usually see in our daily lives. For instance, if I eat an ice cream, or use any emoji in my chat, I crochet them. creator: Kiera McDonald
content: “Salty,” a grey seal, was successfully released back into the ocean Tuesday after recovering from a life-threatening entanglement in marine debris, according to a statement from the National Marine Life Center . On June 15, staff and volunteers from the Seacoast Science Center in Rye, N.H. responded to reports of a distressed seal off the coast of New Hampshire, the statement said. Salty, also known by her full-name Salted Caramel, was found trapped in a six-pound snarl of rope and fishing net,...

The Ohio senator’s headlining address will be his first speech as the Republican vice-presidential nominee. Vance, 39, is positioned to become the next potential leader of the former president’s political...

title: Elderly man denied entry to Bengaluru mall for wearing dhoti, video sparks outrage
content: Listen to Story An elderly man was allegedly denied entry to a shopping mall in Bengaluru for reportedly wearing a dhoti, a traditional Indian attire. A video of the man and his son appealing to security staff at the GT Mall has sparked outrage online. The incident occurred on Tuesday evening when security personnel stopped a father and son at the mall entrance, despite them having tickets booked for a movie. title: The noticeable absence at Donald Trump's side during the Republican National Convention
content: It has been a truly memorable few days for US politics , with the first assassination attempt against a President in 43 years taking place against Donald Trump . Days later, he claimed his title at at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, being named the Republican presidential nominee for the third time. Amid all the hubbub, it's easy to not notice the details. But one person's absence was noticed – that of Melania Trump , Donald Trump's wife. READ MORE: Fergie's shock move after...

title: In a media world that loves sharp lines, discussions of the Trump shooting follow a predictable path
content: There aren't a lot of facts. There are, however, an avalanche of conclusions. So it goes in many corners of the news media and among its frequent commentators in the aftermath of the assassination attempt on Donald Trump. Authorities why a 20-year-old Pennsylvania man attempted to assassinate the former president — and, now that the gunman is dead, may never know. That hasn't stopped media figures and politicians from robust speculation. President Joe Biden, Democrats and left-leaning media...

title: With Haitian migration growing, a Mexico City family of doctors is helping out
content: Last year, the Hernández Pacheco family began to notice a number of Haitians arriving at an apartment across the street from their medical clinic on the outskirts of Mexico City. Their two-story, mint-green office sits on a small street in working class Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl. The Haitians stood out among the tamal vendors and street merchants, sitting out in the sun to warm up in the chilled high-elevation air. title: Organizers expect enough signatures to ask Nebraska voters to repeal private school funding law
content: Public school advocates believe they have enough signatures to ask Nebraska voters in November to repeal a law that provides taxpayer money for private school tuition, marking the latest twist in a long-running fight with state lawmakers who have repeatedly opposed efforts to let voters weigh in on the public funding plan. title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
creator: News Staff
content: CONCORD, Mass. (AP) — Nearly 250 years ago, hundreds of militiamen lined a hillside in Massachusetts and started firing a barrage of musket balls toward retreating British troops, marking the first major battle in the Revolutionary War. The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. Early analysis of the balls — gray with sizes ranging from a pea to a marble — indicates colonial...

content: The official theme of the Republican national convention’s second night was “Make America Safe Again”, with a focus on crime and border security. title: Aces rally after rough first half, but fall at home to Sky
creator: Callie Lawson-Freeman
content: The Aces lost to the Chicago Sky 93-85 on Tuesday at Michelob Ultra Arena. A’ja Wilson led the Aces (16-8) with 28 points. Chennedy Carter had 34 for the Sky (10-14). The Aces trailed by as many as 21 points in the first half. They tied the score in the final four minutes of the game before Chicago pulled away. This is developing story. Check back for updates. Contact Callie Lawson-Freeman at clawsonfreeman@reviewjournal. com . Follow @CallieJLaw on X.

title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
creator: MICHAEL CASEY, Associated Press

title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
creator: By MICHAEL CASEY - Associated Press
content: CONCORD, Mass. (AP) — Nearly 250 years ago, hundreds of militiamen lined a hillside in Massachusetts and started firing a barrage of musket balls toward retreating British troops, marking the first major battle in the Revolutionary War. The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. Early analysis of the balls — gray with sizes ranging from a pea to a marble — indicates colonial...

title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
content: The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. Early analysis of the balls — gray with sizes ranging from a pea to a marble — indicates colonial militia members fired them at British forces on April 19, 1775. “As soon as they pulled one of them out of the ground, there was kind of a ‘look what I have,’” said Minute Man park ranger and historic weapons specialist Jarrad Fuoss, who was...

title: iPad Air (13-inch, 2024) Review

title: In a media world that loves sharp lines, discussions of the Trump shooting follow a predictable path
creator: News Staff
content: There aren’t a lot of facts. There are, however, an avalanche of conclusions. creator: AFP
content: MUSCAT: A Comorian-flagged oil tanker capsized off Oman on Monday, the sultanate's Maritime Security Centre (MSC) said, adding that a search was under way for its missing crew of 16. title: As Gaza’s doctors struggle to save lives, many lose their own in Israeli airstrikes
creator: Sarah El Deeb, The Associated Press
content: BEIRUT (AP) — Dr. Hassan Hamdan was one of the few trained plastic surgeons in Gaza, a specialist in wound reconstruction. His skills were vitally needed as Israel’s military onslaught filled hospitals with patients torn by blasts and shrapnel, so the 65-year-old came out of retirement to help. title: Twisters Review
content: An in-name-only follow-up to Twister – Jan de Bont's theme park ride-spawning disaster movie from 1996 – Lee Isaac Chung's Twisters is a different kind of ride. Its weather-related mayhem is less visually appealing than de Bont's, but it remains rooted in a solid dramatic throughline, which gives way to gripping vistas that help overcome its aesthetic shortcomings. The storms never quite seem real, but they're made to feel real, thanks to the movie's characters and lead performances. It's one...

creator: TOI CITY DESK
content: NEW DELHI: A man and his two minor daughters were shot dead by criminals at their house in Dhana Dih village of Saran district, Bihar late on Tuesday. The man's wife was sent to a hospital in injured condition. The two accused identified as Sudhanshu Kumar and Ankit Kumar were arrested by the police. According to reports, the cause of the incident is a love angle between the deceased and Sudhanshu Kumar. The bodies of the victims have been sent for post-mortem.

title: Adıyaman'da tır ile otomobil çarpıştı: 1 ölü

Kazayı görenlerin ihbarı üzerine olay yerine AFAD, itfaiye ve sağlık ekipleri sevk edildi. Otomobilde sıkışan yaralılar, ekiplerin yardımıyla çıkarılarak sağlık ekiplerine teslim edildi. title: הפועל באופוריה: "מעבר לכל דמיון". עושים סדר - כל מה שנותר הקיץ למועדון
content: עופר ינאי שוב הדהים. הפועל תל אביב החתימה אתמול (רביעי) ללא ספק את אחד השמות הגדולים שהוחתמו בישראל, כשפטריק בברלי חתם במועדון לשנתיים. בכך, האדומים הוסיפו עוד חתיכת לפאזל, ועוד איזה חתיכה, לסגל שנבנה והם קרובים מאוד לסיום כשזה הזמן לעשות סדר. ראשית, במועדון יוצאים מגדרם על ההחתמה: “נראה שאין כבר אחד באירופה שלא יודע מי זה עופר ינאי. אנחנו עדיין צובטים את עצמינו בגלל איפה שהיינו לפני כמה שנים ואיפה אנחנו עכשיו. מיותר לציין שזה הסגל הכי טוב על הנייר במועדון אי פעם, אבל אנחנו באמת לא זוכרים לעולם...

title: As Gaza’s doctors struggle to save lives, many lose their own in Israeli airstrikes
content: BEIRUT (AP) — Dr. Hassan Hamdan was one of the few trained plastic surgeons in Gaza, a specialist in wound reconstruction. His skills were vitally needed as Israel’s military onslaught filled hospitals with patients torn by blasts and shrapnel, so the 65-year-old came out of retirement to help. Earlier this month, an Israeli airstrike killed him along with his wife, son, two daughters, a daughter-in-law, a son-in-law, six grandchildren and one other person, as his family sheltered in their home...

title: Another batch of pilgrims leaves for Amarnath yatra
content: Jammu, Jul 17 (PTI) A fresh batch of 3,700 pilgrims left for the Amarnath cave shrine in South Kashmir Himalayas on Wednesday amidst tight security measures. The 20th batch of pilgrims left at 3:05 am in 127 vehicles under CRPF escort from Bhagwati Nagar base camp. The group included 2,734 men, 952 women and nine children. Of these, 2,305 pilgrims opted for the traditional 48-km Pahalgam route, while 1,435 chose the shorter but steeper 14-km Baltal route, they said. The 52-day yatra, which...

title: RBNZ Sectoral Factor Inflation Model rises 3.6% YoY in Q2 2024
content: The Reserve Bank of New Zealand (RBNZ) released its Sectoral Factor Model Inflation gauge for the second quarter of 2024, following the release of the by the NZ Stats early Wednesday. The inflation measure dropped to 3.6% YoY in Q2 2024 vs. 4.2% in Q1. The inflation measures are closely watched by the , which has a monetary policy goal of achieving 1% to 3% inflation. content: Significant government spending increases today often lead to budget problems tomorrow. Just look at UNLV. content: BETHEL PARK, Pa. creator: By BEN FINLEY - Associated Press

title: Eagle Archives, July 17, 1957: The real 'Mr. Roberts' of U.S. Navy fame could be the son of Lenox selectman
content: LENOX — The real-life "Mr. Roberts" of the book, play and movie of the same name is believed to be the son of a Lenox selectman. Don House, of Chicago, Ill., son of Lenox Selectman and retired Navy Capt. Charles F. House of Walker Street, served on the same ship during World War II as the late Thomas Heggen. After the war, Heggen made his experiences on the ship the basis for his novel, "Mr. Roberts," which was a best seller in the late 1940s. It also became a play which ran for 1,151...

content: Bard SummerScape is set to present the first-ever U.S. production of Meyerbeer’s “Le Prophète” in 47 years. The production of the Meyerbeer masterpiece will be directed by Christian Räth and conducted by Leon Botstein. It will star Robert Watson, Jennifer Feinstein, and Amina Edris. “’Le prophète’ is unique because, beyond its historical elements, it has so many parallels to the world that we live in today,” Räth said in an official press release. “I don’t see how you could stage it today...

creator: George LeMay Las Vegas
content: I suggest that Clark County Commissioner Tick Segerblom change his name. Then if it doesn’t suit him, he can change it again. We may not remember him, but what big loss would that be anyway? Mr. Segerblom seems to have nothing better to do than to change good established names to entertain his fancy and pat himself on the back. He pushed to change McCarran International Airport to Harry Reid International Airport. Now he wants to change Clark County to Las Vegas County. What is this, an effort...

He continues his work now helping to address the needs of the unhoused in our community. Dan would listen to his constituents concerns and represent us well in Augusta. Norm...

title: О разведчике-нелегале Абеле-Фишере рассказывают его американские соратники, Герои России
content: А Лона и Моррис Коэны - американцы и советские атомные разведчики-нелегалы. Удостоены в середине 1990-х, когда Лоны уже не было, звания Героев России. С Моррисом я долго беседовал в его квартире на Бронной. Во многом, вернее, очень во многом благодаря Коэнам и были добыты чертежи, расчеты американской атомной бомбы. Коэны - подчиненные полковника, работали с ним в США. Дружили в Советском Союзе. И оставили не воспоминания, а скорее искренние служебные записи о своем начальнике и друге....

title: Today in History: July 17, Disneyland's opening day

title: The Gap Between Minimum Wage and the Cost of Living in Every State
creator: GOBankingRates
content: “Minimum wage” and “living wage” aren’t just different concepts. They are also often very far apart. In all 50 U.S. states and the District of Columbia, state minimum-wage income falls short of the average . In many cases, far short. That’s according to a new GOBankingRates study comparing the two. In the states where a minimum wage job will get you closest to paying your bills, you’ll still come up about $14,000 short each year. title: Вопросы после трагедии в Оше: в следующий раз "смоет" Бишкек?
content: В Ошской области Кыргызстана после проливных дождей снова сошли сели: они обрушились на город Ош и несколько районов. Из берегов вышла река Ак-Буура, потоки воды, грязи и камней переворачивали автомобили, смывали мосты и столбы. Почему так произошло и кому еще угрожает стихия – в материале "ВЭС 24" . Кыргызстан в состоянии шока. И в поисках ответов, как могла произойти трагедия в Оше. Ведь тысячи ответственных лиц получают свои зарплаты, и все эти годы отчитывались все хорошо. До тех пор,...

title: 衞生署牙科診所—帳委會:優化安排未能解決長時間排隊輪候 促研設定求診者資格
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 立法會政府帳目委員會今天(17日)向立法會提交報告,分別公布「緊急牙科服務和長者牙科護理支援」及「提供和監察復康巴士服務」兩項聆訊結果。帳委會主席邵家輝指,緊急牙科服務的籌數由2018至2019年度約4萬個,大幅減至2022至2023年度的約2萬個,他提及衞生署在2022年9月實施新安排,在服務當天凌晨12時為市民作初步登記預留籌號,市民可於早上返回診所取籌就診,但此安排未能解決有市民長時間排隊輪候的情況。 帳委會對此表示極度關注和不滿,強烈建議當局檢討現時提供緊急牙科服務的做法,並探討是否可設定求診者的資格,例如設定入息水平,以確保資源用得其所。 另外,邵家輝指,帳委會關注為長者提供參加牙科外展服務計劃的多個非政府機構的服務達標率參差,而關愛基金的長者牙科服務資助項目在2018-2019年度至2022-2023年度的實際受惠人數,亦較估算為低。帳委會強烈建議當局積極與非政府機構及資助項目的推行機構加強溝通,務求令每一位有需要的長者均可獲提供服務。...

title: A Gaza father mourns his baby boy, killed in bed by an Israeli airstrike
content: The dead Palestinian toddler’s limbs were pale and cold despite the sweltering summer heat in Gaza. Outside the hospital, his father cradled the boy in his arms, unable or unwilling to say goodbye. Flies circled and landed in the child’s soft hair. “What did he do wrong, my God? What did he do wrong?” screamed Mahmoud Mikdad, his voice hoarse, lifting his face toward the sky. His son, Yaman, was killed by an Israeli airstrike. Israeli strikes in southern and central Gaza from Monday night into...

title: Guatemalan family seeks return of relative's body more than a decade after he disappeared in Mexico
content: Nearly a decade after Guatemalan authorities were told that Mexico had sent the wrong body to a Guatemalan family searching for their missing teenage relative, that unidentified body is still buried in Guatemala and the family’s relative is lying in a Mexico City morgue. The family, which declined to comment through its lawyer, wants 17-year-old Yovanny back, but also wants the body it buried exhumed, identified and returned to their relatives. title: Pune News : वाहतूक सुरळीत करण्यासाठी बदल केले, नकाशे कधी? ‘एचसीएमटीआर’वर हरकती घेण्यास अडचणी

title: Маск анонсировал переезд штаб-квартиры SpaceX
content: Американский миллиардер, основатель космической компании SpaceX Илоон Маск сообщил в своем микроблоге в социальной сети Х о переносе ее штаб-квартиры. По его словам, компания покинет штат Калифорния, ее новым местом дислокации станет космодром Starbase близ города Браунсвилл в Техасе. Основанием для принятия подобного решения Маск назвал изменения в законодательстве и введение запрета для школ информировать родителей в случае, если их ребенок начинает идентифицировать себя как трансгендера,...

title: Danh tính chuyên gia trang điểm là 1 trong 6 người Việt chết ở Thái Lan
content: Theo Bangkok Post , ngay sau khi vụ án xảy ra, danh tính 6 nạn nhân đã được xác nhận. title: शंभू बॉर्डर खोलने की डेडलाइन खत्म: किसान करेंगे दिल्ली कूच, 15 अगस्त को देश भर में ट्रैक्टर मार्च
creator: न्यूज डेस्क, अमर उजाला, चंडीगढ़
content: वहीं फरवरी से डटे किसानों ने हाईकोर्ट के आदेश के बाद दिल्ली कूच का एलान कर दिया है। संयुक्त किसान मोर्चा गैर राजनीतिक के सदस्य जगजीत सिंह डल्लेवाल ने कहा कि वह शंभू सीमा खुलते ही दिल्ली के लिए कूच कर देंगे। 15 अगस्त को ट्रैक्टर मार्च निकालने का भी फैसला लिया गया है। यह ट्रैक्टर मार्च देश भर में निकाला जाएगा।

title: Food Recipe: घर पर तैयार करें 5 मिनट में बनने वाली ये खास डिश, आसान है बनाने का तरीका
content: अधिकतर लोग शाम 4 बजे के समय चाय के साथ चटपटा खाना पसंद करते हैं. ऐसे में हर कोई ऐसी डिश बनाना चाहता है, जो कम समय में जल्दी बनकर तैयार हो जाए. आप भी कम समय में बनने वाली रेसिपी खोज रहे हैं तो पालक चीला रेसिपी को फॉलो कर सकते हैं. यह सेहत के लिए भी बेस्ट मानी गई है. पालक पिज़्ज़ा बनाने के लिए आपको पालक के पत्तों को धोकर बारीक काटना होगा, फिर इसे मिक्सर में पीसकर पेस्ट तैयार कर लें. अब आप एक बड़े बर्तन में बेसन, पालक पेस्ट, हल्दी पाउडर, लाल मिर्च पाउडर, जीरा, धनिया, प्याज, नमक, हरी मिर्च डालकर...

title: В Якутии учредили знак отличия для семей, проживших в браке не менее 50 лет
content: ЯКУТСК, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Знак отличия "Семейная доблесть" учрежден в Якутии для семей, отмечающих юбилейную дату супружеской жизни и проживших в совместном браке не менее 50 лет. Об этом сообщил глава Якутии Айсен Николаев в своем Telegram-канале . "Семья - самое ценное в жизни человека. content: PARIS—French President Emmanuel Macron accepted the prime minister’s resignation Tuesday but kept him on as head of a caretaker government, as France prepares to host the Paris Olympics at the end of the month. The president’s office said in a statement that Macron “accepted” the resignation of Prime Minister Gabriel Attal and other ministers on Tuesday. content: અનંત અંબાણી અને રાધિકા મર્ચન્ટના લગ્ન થઈ ગયા છે. શુક્રવાર 12 જુલાઈ 2024 ના રોજ અનંતે તેની મંગેતર રાધિકા મર્ચન્ટ સાથે ફેરા ફર્યા. તેમના ગ્રાન્ડ વેડિંગની હાલમાં માત્ર ભારતમાં જ નહીં પરંતુ દેશ-વિદેશમાં પણ ચર્ચા થઈ રહી છે. આ કપલના લગ્નમાં બોલિવૂડથી લઈને હોલીવુડ, રાજકારણથી લઈને રમતગમત ક્ષેત્રની અનેક હસ્તીઓએ પણ હાજરી આપી હતી. અંબાણી પરિવારે અનંત-રાધિકાના લગ્નમાં આવેલા મહેમાનો માટે ખાવા-પીવાની ખાસ વ્યવસ્થા પણ કરી હતી, જેની એક ઝલક અમે તમને બતાવવા જઈ રહ્યા છીએ. જેમાં અનેક પ્રકારની વાનગીઓનો સમાવેશ...

title: New Washington State AD Anne McCoy says finding permanent conference top priority

content: PULLMAN — Jake McCoy always knew when his mom was at his sister’s swim meets. title: Грозы и жара до 37 градусов ожидаются в Воронежской области
content: Ближайшие дни, с 17 по 19 июля, в Воронежской области ожидается опасное метеорологическое явление – сильная жара. Максимальная температура воздуха достигнет 35-37 градусов. На территории региона пройдут дожди с грозами. Погоду области будет определять антициклон. Об этом сообщил местный гидрометцентр. Сегодня в среду, 17 июля , на территории Воронежской области ожидается переменная облачность. Без существенных осадков. Ветер северный 6-11 м/с. Днем прогнозируется сильная жара: 32-37°. В...

content: BMW-kuskin kaahailu parkkipaikalla Riihimäellä johti rajuun vaaratilanteeseen. title: Joshua McDonnell departs PHD for GroupM and Mindshare
creator: Mediaweek
content: Joshua McDonnell will depart from PHD Australia after almost three years as the agency’s marketing director. McDonnell, who worked as a media trade journalist before moving to Adland, will leave the Omnicom Media Group agency next month for GroupM and Mindshare as growth and marketing director. title: Bung offers Rafizi 'guided tour' of poverty-stricken areas in Sabah
content: KUALA LUMPUR: Come to Tongod and Kinabatangan to get a better idea of poverty in Sabah, Datuk Seri Bung Moktar Radin (BN-Kinabatangan) has told Economy Minister Rafizi Ramli. He also questioned how poverty was defined in the peninsula and Sabah after Rafizi told the Dewan Rakyat on Wednesday (July 17) that 6,937 Sabah households were categorised as hardcore poor. “Both these areas (Tongod and Kinabatangan) are close to the size of Pahang," Bung Moktar responded. title: Fear as another man killed by hippo in Lake Naivasha
content: Fear and anxiety has gripped the fisherfolk around Lake Naivasha following the sharp rise in cases of fatal hippo attacks. This came as another man was attacked and killed by a hippo in South Lake while fishing on the shores of the lake, as his colleagues fled from the troubled water body. Since the year began, more than 20 people have died either from drowning or hippo attacks with illegal fishermen, popularly known as ‘foot-fishermen’, being the most affected. title: Assam: Three militants killed in intense encounter with security forces in Cachar
content: Three militants were killed in an encounter with security forces in Assam's Cachar district late on July 16. The incident took place in the Bhuban Hills on the Assam-Mizoram border. Reports indicate that three militants were shot dead during the exchange of fire. Earlier in the day, three militants were arrested with weapons in Dhalai Ganga Nagar, Cachar. title: Singapore landlord gets 10 months’ jail for using pinhole cameras to peep on Malaysian tenant showering, changing clothes
content: SINGAPORE — A landlord installed eight pinhole cameras around his flat so that he could watch his female tenant in acts such as changing her clothes and using the bathroom. Poon Lee Daniel, 68, a Singaporean, was sentenced to 10 months’ jail after pleading guilty to one charge of voyeurism and another charge of possessing a voyeuristic image. Another charge of voyeurism was taken into consideration for sentencing. The tenant, a 29-year-old Malaysian, moved into the flat on Jan 17, 2019. Poon...

title: Madhya Pradesh Congress chief alleges ‘state-sponsored’ spyware attack on his iPhone
creator: Scroll Staff
content: Madhya Pradesh Congress chief Jitu Patwari alleged in a police complaint on Tuesday that his iPhone was targeted by spyware in a “state-sponsored attempt to misuse his data for political gains”, reported The Indian Express . Patwari’s complaint, lodged with the police’s cyber cell in Bhopal, alleged that he received a threat notification from technology company Apple on July 9, followed by another on July 11 warning of an account recovery request for his Apple ID. title: Samsun'da otomobil bariyerlere çarptı: 1 ölü, 2 yaralı
content: Feci kaza, Samsun-Sinop karayolunda saat 02.30 sıralarında meydana geldi. title: Colleyville Heritage product Bobby Witt Jr. talks about All-Star Game experience
creator: Fort Worth Star-Telegram
content: Following a runner-up performance in the , shortstop played in his first All-Star Game on Tuesday. The Colleyville Heritage product replaced shortstop in the sixth inning and played the rest of the game in a 5-3 American League win. He had one at-bat, a seventh inning strikeout against pitcher . title: 폭우 쏟아진 경기북부...파주·연천, 교량·댐 수위 상승
creator: 김도희 기자
content: [파주=뉴시스] 김도희 기자 = 경기북부지역에 폭우가 쏟아지면서 파주와 연천 등 교량과 댐 수위가 상승세를 보이고 있다. 17일 한강홍수통제소에 따르면 임진강 최북단 남방한계선에 있는 필승교 수위와 군남홍수조절댐 수위가 점차 오르고 있다. 필승교 수위는 이날 오전 4시께 0.41m에서 조금씩 상승하기 시작해 이날 오후 12시 현재 기준 0.68m로 올랐다. 연천 사랑교와 삼화교, 차탄교 등 대부분의 교량 수위가 지속해서 높아지고 있다....

title: Евсеев: «Микаутадзе «взрывается» лучше, чем Кварацхелия»
content: Бывший защитник сборной России Вадим Евсеев сравнил нападающих сборной Грузии Хвичу Кварацхелию и Жоржа Микаутадзе. «Микаутадзе «взрывается» лучше, чем Кварацхелия. Я говорю именно об игре с места. Я не могу сравнить с кем-то Кварацхелию или глубоко проанализировать его игру. Да, сегодня ценятся футболисты, которые умеют обыгрывать один в один. Хвича — один из них», — цитирует Metaratings.ru Евсеева. На Евро-2024 23-летний Микаутадзе забил 3 гола и сделал одну голевую передачу.

title: سازمان جهانی بهداشت: اسرائیل باید حملات خود را متوقف کند
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: مارگارت هریس، سخنگوی سازمان جهانی بهداشت گفت: فرض بر اینکه عناصر مسلح در بیمارستان حضور دارند نمی‌تواند توجیحی برای حمله به آن باشد. به گزارش بامداد چهارشنبه الجزیره، وی افزود: مراکز درمانی باید همیشه در هر شرایطی مکانی امن بمانند و (رژیم) اسرائیل باید بدون هیچ توجیحی به حملات خود به بیمارستان‌های غزه و کرانه باختری پایان دهد. این مقام سازمان جهانی بهداشت همچنین از کشور‌های دارای نفوذ بر رژیم صهیونیستی خواست که برای توقف حملات این رژیم به بیمارستان‌ها در غزه و کرانه باختری فشار بیاورند....

title: Man rescued after spending night stuck on Yarra River embankment in Kew
creator: Clareese Packer
content: An injured man has been rescued after spending the night stuck on a Yarra River embankment. A man slipped and fell into shallow waters near Studley Park Rd in the Melbourne suburb of Kew on Tuesday night. He remained stuck until Wednesday morning when a nearby resident found him. The 55-year-old man was unable to pull himself free due to a leg injury as temperatures dropped down to a chilly 8C overnight. Fire Rescue Victoria central operations commander Mitch Simons told the Herald Sun the man...

title: CM Revanth congratulates mountaineer for scaling Mount Kang Yatse (II)
creator: The Hans India
content: Hyderabad: Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy on Tuesday congratulated the young mountaineer from the Tribal community hailing from Mahbubabad district, Bhukya Yashwanth Naik, who had scaled Mount Kang Yatse (II), which stands at 6,250 metres above sea level in Ladakh. Earlier, Revanth Reddy who recognised the talented youngster from the Tribal community, had awarded him Rs 5 lakh through Telangana Sports Authority. Naik has already scaled Mount Kilimanjaro (Africa), Mount Elbrus (Europe), Mount...

title: Odisha to deploy 190 platoons of police in charge of security during Sunabesha
creator: Express News Service
content: PURI: For the Sunabesha of the deities this Wednesday, 190 platoons of police will be deployed for security and crowd management, said SP Pinak Mishra, on Tuesday. The administration expects around 15 lakh devotees to witness the event. Barricades have been set up from the municipal market square to Simhadwar, and all visitors must pass through these in a queue. title: США могут лишить права на проведение Олимпиады в 2028 и 2034 годах
content: ЛОНДОН, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Всемирное антидопинговое агентство (WADA) может лишить Антидопинговое агентство США (USADA) статуса соответствия, что приведет к запрету на проведение крупных соревнований, в том числе Олимпийских игр в 2028 и 2034 годах. Такое мнение высказал почетный президент WADA и член Международного олимпийского комитета Ричард Паунд, комментарий которого приводит агентство Reuters . title: कार के सनरूफ से बाहर निकलने पर मनाही, तो फिर इसका क्या है काम?
content: दुनियाभर में लग्जरी गाड़ियों का क्रेज तेजी से बढ़ रहा है. बीते कुछ सालों में सनरूफ गाड़ियों का क्रेज भी बढ़ा है. लेकिन अगर कोई व्यक्ति सनरूफ से सिर निकालकर घूमता है, तो पुलिस उसका चालान काट देती है. अब सवाल ये है कि आखिर कार में सनरूफ क्यों दिया गया है और इसका इस्तेमाल किस काम के लिए किया जाता है. आज हम आपको बताएंगे कि सनरूफ का इस्तेमाल क्यों होता है. सनरूफ कार आज के वक्त अधिकांश कार के टॉप मॉडल में सनरूफ आ रहा है. लेकिन आपने देखा होगा कि जब कोई सड़कों पर सनरूफ के बाहर सिर निकालकर घूमता है, तो...

title: After a trying 2 weeks, Rangers’ Mike Maddux was back in his ‘safe spot’ at All-Star Game
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — Everything around him was loud. The music at Globe Life Field bumped. The throng in front of him doing interviews, creating content and just generally milling about was a cacophonous mess. The uniform he wore was positively garish. Neon salmon lettering? C’mon. It didn’t seem like the best atmosphere for reflection. Then again, it was a baseball field. Doesn’t matter if it’s everything that goes along with the All-Star Game or the back fields at Rancho High School in Las...

title: ダムに車転落、女性が心肺停止 助けようとした男性が行方不明 長野
content: 17日午前8時55分ごろ、 新開の黒川ダム黒川渡橋付近で、「車が落ちたようだ」と木曽消防署から木曽署に通報があった。落ちたのは軽乗用車で、車内から20代の女性が見つかり、町内の病院に運ばれたが、心肺停止という。また、女性を助けようと、ダムに飛び込んだ60代ぐらいの男性と連絡が取れていないという。 警察や消防などによると、女性は現場近くの看護専門学校に通う生徒とみられるという。女性とみられる声で学校に「車ごとダムに落ちた」と電話があり、学校が消防に通報した。行方不明の男性は学校の職員という。署が事故の原因を調べている。 ※無料期間中に解約した場合、料金はかかりません

title: Bộ Tài chính ‘quay xe’, đề xuất không giảm phí trước bạ với ô tô lắp ráp trong nước

content: "Large?" the server asked when I ordered a cinnamon roll-flavoured Chillata (£3.99) at Cinnabon. Not only is this an American chain, but they were giving it the American serving techniques too. I said yes, reader, because I'm out of control as a person. title: DSE放榜2024—英華女學校誕全港唯一「女超級狀元」 冀升讀醫科:因喜歡與人交流
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 中學文憑試(DSE)今日(17日)放榜,今屆DSE全港只有一位女超級狀元,於英華女學校誕生。超級狀元劉翯悠考獲7科5星星,中英數主科、選修科生物、化學、歷史和M1均奪得5星星。今年文憑試以公民與社會發展科代替通識科,她認為公民科只分達標與不達標,令她心理壓力較小,更容易成為超級狀元。 劉翯悠期望大學升讀醫科,「想讀醫嘅人最重要係鍾意同人交流」。對於今年文憑試以公民與社會發展科代替通識科,她稱沒因此感到遺憾,認為因為公民科只分達標與不達標,所以心理壓力較小,而且更容易成為超級狀元。 考獲7科5星星的佳績,劉翯悠感謝父母的陪伴,以及校長和老師的悉心栽培,她在放榜前更寫了感謝信並附上自己的畫作,送給校長。 記者 溫樂汶 相關新聞: DSE放榜2024—一文睇清今屆八間「狀元搖籃」 10名尖子身份陸續曝光! DSE放榜2024—喇沙書院誕兩狀元 其中一名超級狀元將赴英修讀經濟金融及數據科學 DSE放榜2024—考生為「好意頭」手持星島日報等放榜 寓意「升到」大學 DSE放榜2024|學友社建議考獲邊緣分數同學要做兩手準備 青協兩日接近800宗求助或查詢

title: US women’s soccer team fights the heat, plays to goalless draw against Costa Rica in final Olympic tuneup
creator: Stephen Whyno
content: WASHINGTON — The heat was on for the US women’s soccer team’s final exhibition tune-up game before the Paris Olympics, with sweltering temperatures in the air and plenty of chances to score. The goals did not come in a 0-0 draw against Costa Rica on Tuesday night, just the second time — and first since 2015 — the US did not win its last game before a major tournament. But the match showed the Americans could handle the kind of high temperatures that could await later this month. “The last two...

title: Duran's two-run homer lifts AL to 5-3 win over NL in All-Star Game
creator: Stephen Hawkins, The Associated Press
content: ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) — Boston's Jarren Duran, the All-Star MVP, hit a tiebreaking two-run homer in the fifth inning and the American League beat the National League 5-3 on Tuesday night for its 10th win in the past 11 All-Star Games. Pittsburgh rookie Paul Skenes pitched a hitless first for the NL, twice hitting 100 m.p.h., and Shohei Ohtani of the Los Angeles Dodgers hit a three-run homer in the third to give the NL a 3-0 lead. Juan Soto hit a two-run double and scored on David Fry's single...

title: 吳善揮 - 多元品德教育活動 成就陽光正向少年|學友智庫
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 品德教育向來予人一種流於說教的刻板印象。這是因為不少學校都以單向方式來教導學生品德價值,使學生失去對品德教育的學習興趣。這種填鴨式的課堂不但無助學生理解不同品德情意價值的內涵,而且更不能讓他們反思不同行為在道德上的對錯。 事實上,品德教育應以多元化的模式施行,一方面為學生創設不同情景,讓他們明白所學意義,另一方面以知(明理)、情(動情)、意(堅定)、行(實踐)為主軸,為他們帶來多元體驗,讓他們在滿滿的學習興趣下,建構健康的價值觀。 筆者也於校內實施多元品德教育活動,以照顧不同學生的學習需要和興趣。在認識價值方面,我們以德育課為基礎,兼採融入式教學(於各學科滲透品德教育)教導學生多元的品德價值內涵,如誠信、感恩、堅毅、孝親等,讓他們理解這些品德價值之重要意義。在引發情感方面,我們運用多元化的教學活動,以引發他們的學習興趣,例如通過設計反貪海報,增進學生對誠信的認知;以華語流行歌曲賞析活動(以小肥《負親》為教材)引發學生對孝親價值的反思;以戲劇活動(如良心胡同)引導學生思考道德兩難的處境;運用繪本《海的另一頭》引發學生對他國人民處境的關注。...

title: 동창생 식물인간 만든 20대, 2심서 "친구에게 미안해...선처를"
creator: 윤난슬 기자

title: Российские бойцы захватили позиции ВСУ, взяв в плен боевиков
content: В Минобороны РФ сообщили, что на одном из участков в зоне проведения специальной военной операции подразделения группировки «Север» захватили и зачистили позиции Вооруженных сил Украины. title: Musk to move X, SpaceX to Texas in deepening rightward shift
creator: Bloomberg
content: Musk made the announcements on his X social media site on Tuesday, citing frustration over a new law in California related to transgender children in public schools. California became the first US state to ban school districts from requiring teachers to notify parents about changes to a student’s sexual orientation and gender identity. “This is the final straw,” Musk said in the post announcing SpaceX’s relocation. The move is the latest development in Musk’s shift toward the political right....

title: बैंककको पाँचतारे होटलमा ६ जना मृत भेटिए
content: थाइल्याण्डको बैंककस्थित पाँचतारे होटलमा ६ जना व्यक्ति मृत भेटिएका छन्। मंगलबार बैंककको ग्राण्ड ह्यात होटलको पाँचौं तलाको एउटै कोठामा ६ जना मृत भेटिएका हुन्। चौबिस घन्टासम्म उक्त कोठामा बसेकाहरूले काउन्टरमा सम्पर्क नगरेपछि र निर्धारित समयमा चेक आउट नगरेपछि होटलका कर्मचारी उनीहरूको स्थिति बुझ्न गएका थिए। बैंककको मेट्रोपोलिटन पुलिस कमिश्नर थिति सेङस्वाङका अनुसार मृत भेटिएकाहरूलाई विष सेवन गराएको हुनसक्ने बताएका छन्। सबै मृतकहरूको शरीरमा कुनै पनि चोटपटक नदेखिएको र कोठामा सेतो पाउडरजस्तो देखिने...

title: 「錶之銀河」劍指香港一哩錦標
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 伍鵬志鎮倉寶「錶之銀河」榮膺今季最佳四歲馬,此駒季內曾勝出獅子山錦標及精英碟兩項三級賽,目前評分高達一一九分,是本港評分最高的現役四歲馬。 「錶之銀河」馬主楊建文的女兒楊潔怡和兒子楊俊建代表父親頒獎,楊潔怡和楊俊建說「錶之銀河」下季目標是進軍各項分級賽,包括十二月香港一哩錦標,至於其他細節,要由父親(楊建文)與練馬師商量再決定。 按圖睇有關相片: 陳嘉甜

title: Director del INA asegura que promueven ocupaciones de tierra
creator: Diario La Tribuna
content: “Hay varios alcaldes de todos lados que están promoviendo las ocupaciones de tierra, al igual que “hay otra gente gruesa”, para enriquecerse», denunció el director del Instituto Nacional Agrario (INA), Francisco Fúnez. Las invasiones promovidas por los alcaldes son a «orilla de la calle, las mejores propiedades urbanas donde el pisto (dinero), va a fluir para venderlas”, reiteró. title: 'धमकी भरा है Blinkit का नोटिफिकेशन, कन्नड़ में भेजो नहीं तो...', शख्स ने किया पोस्ट, भड़के लोग

title: Charles III. verliest Regierungserklärung des neuen Premiers
content: LONDON (dpa-AFX) - Der britische König Charles III. (75) verliest am Mittwoch die Regierungserklärung des neuen Labour-Premierministers Keir Starmer. Das traditionelle "State Opening of Parliament" gehört zu den wichtigsten Terminen im politischen und royalen Kalender in Großbritannien. Es wird stets mit großem Pomp und teils skurril anmutenden Traditionen begangen. title: Cleric's inter-faith mass-marriage plan sparks protests in Bareilly, probe ordered
content: BAREILLY: A protest erupted in Bareilly on Tuesday after a prominent local cleric announced his plan to mass-marry Hindu women to Muslim men , prompting police to order an investigation and assure residents that peace would not be disrupted. The cleric sought permission from authorities for these marriages, which he claimed involved "women already in live-in relationships with Muslim men." title: VIDEO : गाजियाबाद में ईवीएम मशीन की सुरक्षा में तैनात सिपाही ने गोली मार की आत्महत्या
content: गाजियाबाद के मुरादनगर में नगर पालिका परिषद में ईवीएम मशीन की सुरक्षा में तैनात सिपाही पम्मी ने सरकारी रायफल से गोली मारकर आत्महत्या कर ली। सिपाही एक युवती की ब्लैकमेलिंग से परेशान चल रहा था। पुलिस कमिश्रर अजय मिश्र ने घटनास्थल का निरीक्षण किया। नगर पालिका परिषद परिसर स्थित गोदाम में ईवीएम मशीन रखी हुई है। जिनकी सुरक्षा में दिन और रात दो दो सिपाही की डयूटी लगाई जाती है। मंगलवार रात वर्ष 2018 बैच के सिपाही पम्मी पुत्र प्रवीण कुमार निवासी औरंगाबाद जनपद बुलंदशहर व सिपाही ध्यान सिंह मौतला की डयूटी...

title: 2024 Lok Sabha elections: Shiv Sena (UBT) moves HC over Ravindra Waikar’s poll victory
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Amol Kirtikar on Tuesday moved the Bombay High Court challenging the Lok Sabha election victory of Ravindra Waikar, candidate of the Shiv Sena led by Eknath Shinde. In his petition, Kirtikar, who lost by a wafer-thin margin of 48 votes, sought to set aside Waikar’s election as the Member of Parliament from the Mumbai North-West constituency, alleging lapses in the counting process. He also sought a declaration that he was duly elected from the said constituency. Kirtikar,...

title: Wirecard-Prozess: Dritter Angeklagter will Schweigen brechen
content: MÜNCHEN (dpa-AFX) - Eineinhalb Jahre nach Beginn des Wirecard-Prozesses will der bislang schweigsame frühere Chefbuchhalter des Konzerns sich an diesem Mittwoch erstmals zu den Anklagevorwürfen äußern. title: Indian 2 box office collection day 5: Kamal Haasan-Shankar’s box office bomb sinks into single digits, mints Rs 65 cr
content: Indian 2’s box office collection on day five saw the film stabalise after a massive fall on the critical first Monday, but not in a way that will helps the Kamal Haasan-starrer in salvaging its performance. The Shankar-directed movie earned just Rs 3 crore on its fifth day of release, according to industry tracker Sacnilk. With this, the total five-day collections of Indian 2 stand at Rs 65.15 cr. Globally, the vigilante film has grossed over Rs 117 cr. The film’s poor box office performance...

title: Sports News | Rafael Nadal is on the US Open Entry List, Although That Doesn't Mean He Will Play There
content: New York, Jul 17 (AP) Rafael Nadal was on the U.S. Open entry list released via a protected ranking, although that doesn't necessarily mean he will compete in the year's last Grand Slam tournament. Nadal has been dealing with injuries the past two seasons and playing sporadically. He is participating in his first tournament in 1 1/2 months this week in Bastad, Sweden, winning a doubles match alongside Casper Ruud on Monday, then beating Leo Borg, the son of former player Bjorn Borg, in singles...

content: Yönetimin forvet transferinde tüm konsantrasyonunu verdiği Paul Onuachu , sık sık bordo-mavili kulüple ilgili paylaşım yapıyor. Yeniden Trabzonspor forması giymek için kulübü Southampton'a rest çeken ve antrenmanlarını dahi bordo- mavili takımın malzemeleriyle sürdüren Nijeryalı golcü, önceki akşam Batista Mendy ile birlikte çekildiği fotoğrafı paylaştı. title: Yusuf’ta sınır sorunu
content: Avusturya kampında göz dolduran Yusuf Demir için bu performansı yeterli olmayacak. Avusturya Milli Takımı 'nı tercih eden 21 yaşındaki gurbetçi, ancak 12 yabancıdan biri olarak sarı-kırmızılılarda kalabilir. Kontenjanı dolu olan Galatasaray 'da Tete, Oliveira ve Dubois 'e kulüp aranıyor. Yabancı sağ bek ve 8 numara alacak sarı-kırmızılı takımda yer kalmayan Yusuf kiralık gönderilecek.

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Fenerbahçe'ye İranlı gol makinesi!
content: Fenerbahçe'de santrfor arayışları devam ederken, sarı-lacivertliler için Almanya'dan bir iddia ortaya atıldı.

title: Gençlere şartlı izin
content: Bulgarıstan pasaportuna sahip Baran Aksaka'yı Bulgaristan ekibi FK Arda 'ya kiralık göndermeye hazırlanan Galatasaray 'da genç oyunculara teklifler geliyor. Florya ürünü Ali Yeşilyurt , Işık Kaan Arslan , Eren Aydın , Jankat Yılmaz , Batuhan Şen ve Berk Balaban şu an Avusturya 'da kampta A Takım 'la beraber çalışıyor. Fakat bu oyuncuların da oynama şartıyla gönderilmesi bekleniyor.

title: Ara vermek yok
content: Aslan yeni sezon hazırlıklarını dün yaptığı antrenmanla sürdürdü. Dinamik ısınmayla başlayan antrenman, iki grup halinde 8'e 2 pas çalışmasıyla devam etti. Okan Buruk yönetimindeki antrenman, topa sahip olma çalışmasının ardından çift kale maçla sona erdi.

title: Nwakaeme hazır
content: Yeniden takıma katılan Anthony Nwakaeme , transferi sonrası eksikleri olduğu için takımdan ayrı bireysel antrenmanlar yapıyordu. Deneyimli oyuncu kısa sürece açığı kapatırken tamamen takımla antrenmanlara çıkmaya başladı. Nwakaeme'nin kısa sürede hazır hale gelmesi özellikle teknik direktör Avcı'yı mutlu etti.

title: Haller listede
content: Hücum hattına önemli yıldızları dahil eden Beşiktaş , son bir hamle daha yapmak istiyor. Borussia Dortmund 'dan ayrılması beklenen Sebastian Haller listede durmaya devam ediyor. 30 yaşındaki Fildişi Sahilli golcü için temasların süreceği ve deneyimli yıldızla beraber forvet transferinin kapanacağı belirtildi.

title: Jevtovic Konya’da
content: Konyaspor , orta saha Jevtovic ile 2 yıllık imza attı. İmza töreninden sonra konuşan Jevtovic, " Konya benim ikinci evim diyebilirim. Burada çok güzel dostluklar, arkadaşlıklar edinmiştim. Tekrar Konya'da ve Konyaspor'da olduğum için inanın çok mutluyum" dedi. Gaziantep FK'den ayrılan 30 yaşındaki Sırp ön libero, Konyaspor'a 2018-19'da geldi ve 2 sezon boyunca 91 maçta forma giyerken, 9 gol, 2 asist yaptı. Geçen sezon Gaziantep ekibinde 34 maçta 3 gol attı.

title: Tosun'dan 2 yıllık imza
content: Fenerbahçe , Cenk Tosun 'la 2 yıllık sözleşme imzalandığını KAP'a bildirdi. Açıklamada, "F.Bahçemiz, kadrosunu Cenk Tosun ile güçlendirdi. Kendisini 2 yıllığına Sarı Lacivert renklere bağlayan sözleşmeye imza attı." denildi.

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Fenerbahçe'de Ferdi Kadıoğlu için kritik plan!
content: Fenerbahçe'nin yerli yıldızı Ferdi Kadıoğlu, EURO 2024'teki performansı sonrası Avrupa devlerini peşine taktı.

title: İzin bitti mesai başladı
content: Avusturya kampından sonra iki gün izne çıkan sarı-lacivertli futbolcular, dün Samandıra'da top başı yaptı. Teknik Direktör Jose Mourinho önderliğindeki antrenmanda Lugano maçının taktik çalışması üzerinde duruldu. Jose 'nin hırslı oluşu ve oyuncularını sık sık uyarması dikkatlerden kaçmadı.

title: İngiliz ekibi Barış Alper Yılmaz için dev rakamı gözden çıkardı!
content: Galatasaray, sezonu 102 puanla rekor kırarak şampiyon tamamladı. Sarı-kırmızılı ekip, ligi ezeli rakibi Fenerbahçe'nin önünde bitirdi ve 24'üncü şampiyonluğunu ilan etmiş oldu.

title: Szalai, Arabistan'a
content: Karadeniz devi, Fenerbahçe 'nin eski stoperi Attila Szalai ile anlaşmış ancak Hoffenheim 'in yeni başkanının satın alma opsiyon maddesini yükseltmesi nedeniyle beklemeye geçmişti. 26 yaşındaki Macar savunmacı için Suudi Arabistan 'dan bazı takımların devreye girdiği kaydedildi.

title: İyi bir ikili olabiliriz

Batshuayi, "Kendisi çok büyük oyuncu. Ama özelliklerimiz farklı. Birbirimizi tamamlayan forvetler olduğumuzu düşünüyorum. title: Hazırlıklar sürüyor
content: Beşıktaş'ın Slovenya kampı devam ediyor. Siyah beyazlılar çalışmalarını sürdürüyor. Dün günü tek antrenmanla geçen Kartal , teknik direktör Giovanni van Bronckhorst yönetiminde çalıştı. Koşu ve ısınma çalışmalarıyla başlayan antrenman, pas ve şut idmanlarıyla devam etti. Antrenmanın son bölümünde ise taktik ağırlıklı çift kale maç oynandı.

title: ManU reddetti
content: Geçtiğimiz günlerde Manchester United 'ın İskoç orta sahası Scott Mc - Tominay için Ada'ya çıkarma yapan Galatasaray , beklediğini bulamadı. Mirror'da yer alan haberde, ManU'nun Galatasaray'ın teklifini reddettiği bildirildi. 27 yaşındaki orta saha için 20 milyon pound isteyen İngiliz deviyle önümüzdeki günlerde bir görüşme daha yapılabilir. Fakat bu transferin artık gerçekleşmesinin zor bir ihtimal olduğu konuşuluyor. McTominay, Okan Buruk 'un orta saha adayları...

title: Kingsley Coman Fenerbahçe'ye mi transfer oluyor? Yıldız isimden flaş karar!
content: Alman basını, Fenerbahçe'nin kadroya katmak için girişimlerde bulunduğu Kingsley Coman ile ilgili son durumu duyurdu.

title: Ozan hedefe kilitlendi
content: Yeni transfer Ozan Tufan , sezonun başlamasını iple çekiyor. Yeni bir meydan okuma hedefiyle Süper Lig 'e dönen 29 yaşındaki orta saha, kampın en sıkı çalışanlarından biri. Abdullah Avcı 'nın, birçok mevkide oynadığı için 'Seni 6 transfer gibi görüyorum' dediği Ozan , kendisine güvenenleri mahcup etmemek için büyük gayret gösteriyor. Disiplinli ve azimli çalışmalarıyla dikkat çeken 8 numara, kupalar kazanmak ve yeniden A Milli Takım'ın vazgeçilmezlerinden olmak istiyor.

title: Sivasspor güç depoluyo
content: Sivasspor , yeni sezon hazırlıklarının ikinci etap çalışmalarını Erzurum 'da yoğun bir şekilde sürdürüyor. Teknik direktör Bülent Uygun yönetiminde gerçekleştirilen antrenmanda futbolcular kuvvet ve taktik çalıştı

title: Southgate istifa etti
content: İngiltere Futbol Federasyonu, teknik direktör Southgate'in görevinden ayrıldığını açıkladı. EURO 2024 finalinde İspanya 'ya 2-1 kaybeden Southgate'li İngiltere, 2018 Dünya Kupası 'nda yarı final, 2022 Dünya Kupası 'nda çeyrek final oynadı. İngilizler, üst üste 2 final kaybetti.

title: Kadıköy'de yıldız yağmuru
content: Transfer sezonunu Levent Mercan ve Çağlar Söyüncü ile açan Fenerbahçe, EURO 2024 sonrasında gaza bastı, açıklamaları peş peşe yaptı. Önce Galatasaray'ın ilgilendiği Oğuz Aydın için harekete geçildi ve kısa süre içinde Alanyaspor 'la anlaşma sağlandı, ardından da 23 yaşındaki oyuncu İstanbul'a geldi. Oğuz'un açıklanmasından saatler sonra ise bir bomba daha patladı. Beşiktaş ileyollarını ayıran milli yıldız Cenk Tosun 'la anlaşma sağlandı. SAĞLIK KONTROLLERİNDEN...

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Beşiktaş'ın istediği Armand Lauriente için Fenerbahçe devrede!
content: Transferin hareketli takımlarından Beşiktaş ile ilgili İtalyan basınından sürpriz bir iddia ortaya atıldı. Haberde Siyah-Beyazlılar'ın daha önce de gündemine gelen Sassuolo forması giyen 25 yaşındaki İtalyan kanat oyuncusu Armand Lauriente 'ye olan ilgisinin sürdüğü belirtildi. EZELİ RAKİP DEVREDE! Takvim'de yer alan baberin detaylarında Beşiktaş'ın bu transfer için Parma , Torino ve ile yarış halinde olduğu belirtilirken Fenerbahçe 'nin de oyuncuyla ilgilendiği belirtildi....

title: Erzurum’da iki imza
content: İç transfer çalışmalarını sürdüren 1. Lig ekiplerinden Erzurumspor , mevcut kadrosunu koruyor. Dadaşlar, sağ açık Süleyman Koç ve kaleci Göktuğ Bakırbaş 'la yeniden anlaştı. Erzurumspor tesislerinde Başkan Ahmet Dal 'ın katılımlarıyla her iki futbolcu ile 1 yıllık resmi sözleşme imzalandı.

title: Sadece bir maç!
content: Düsseldorf 'a 5-2 mağlup olan Galatasaray 'da Okan Buruk oyuncularla konuştu. Özelliklerle genç isimlerle görüşen Buruk, "Sadece hazırlık maçı oynadık. Sonucun bir önemi yok. Sezon öncesi bu skorların ortaya çıkması doğal. Önümüze bakacağız" dedi.

title: Coman reddetti
content: Alman Sky Sport , Fenerbahçe 'nin Bayern Münih tarafından satış listesine koyulan Kingsley Coman 'a transfer teklifinde bulunduğunu ancak Fransız oyuncunun bunu kabul etmediğini yazdı. Haberde; Fenerbahçe'nin Coman'a Bayern Münih'te aldığından daha fazla maaş önerdiği de belirtildi. Fransız kanat oyuncusu, Münih'ten vergiler dahil senelik 15 milyon euro kazanıyor.

title: Son aday Jelert
content: Galatasaray 'da sağ bek transferinde sıcak saatler yaşanıyor. Doue , Bissaka ve Mazraoui gibi isimlerden sonuç alamayan sarı-kırmızılılar, rotayı bu kez Danimarka 'ya kırdı. Hedefte ise Kopenhag 'dan Elias Jelert var. Gizli bir transfer operasyonu yürüten Aslan , 21 yaşındaki oyuncuya 6.5 milyon euro'luk ilk teklifini sundu. Danimarkalı sağ bekin kulübü ise 10 milyon euro bonservis bedeli istediğini iletti. DUYURU YAPACAK Elias Jelert için teklif geldiğini doğrulayan Kopenhag...

title: Çok yönlü transferler
content: Karadeniz devi transfer sezonuna hızlı başlayarak 6 takviye yaptı. Nokta atışı isimler almak isteyen bordo-mavililer; Anthony Nwakaeme , Ozan Tufan , Denis Draguş, Borna Barisic , John Lundstram ve Cihan Çanak 'ı renklerine kattı. Söz konusu isimlerin hepsinin farklı mevkilerde de görev yapabilmeleri dikkat çekti. Abdullah Avcı , yeni transferin çok yönlü olmasına dikkat ediyor. Nwakaeme sol kanat ve forvette, Draguş sol kanat, forvet ve 10 numarada, Ozan Tufan 10 numara, orta saha...

title: Duayenler meclisi
content: Bugün ne Nazım'ın şiirlerinden ne de Abidin'in resimlerinden bahsetmeyeceğim. Uhud Savaşı'na da girmeyeceğim. Akşam Atv ekranlarında büyük üstat Oktay Kaynarca'nın sunduğu yarışma programı Alan'ı izledim. Elenen yarışmacıların miras bırakıp gitmelerini ve programa sempatik bir şekilde veda etmelerini hayranlıkla takip ettim. Namıdiğer Çakır'ın, Hızır Reis'in hafızalara kazınmış racon kesmelerinden sonra; Alan'da yarışmacısına ve seyirciye usta dokunuşunu imrenerek seyrettim. O...

title: Güle güle Lahtimi
content: Yönetim, yabancı kontenjanını düşürmek için harekete geçti. Lahtimi'nin menajeri, sözleşmesinin feshedilmesi için Trabzon 'a çağrılmıştı. Bir yıllık daha sözleşmesi olan 23 yaşındaki Faslı sağ kanadın anlaşması bedelsiz feshedildi.

title: Lundstram lider oyuncu
content: Yeni transfer Lundstram, idmanlardaki performansıyla şimdiden dikkat çekmeyi başardı. Hamsik ve Bakasetas'ın ayrılığı sonrası bir lider oyuncu eksikliği yaşayan Fırtına 'da İngiliz orta sahanın transferiyle bu eksikliğin giderileceği görüşü hakim oldu. Güçlü, kuvvetli ve yıldırıcı bir tarzın yanı sıra sahiplenme, aidiyet ve skor olarak geriye düştüğünde takım arkadaşlarını ayağa kaldıracak bir karaktere sahip olan 30 yaşındaki futbolcunun tam bir komutan görevi...

title: Shakhtar maçı bugün
content: Slovenya 'nın Maribor kentinde kamp yapan Beşiktaş , bugün hazırlık maçında Ukrayna temsilcisi Shakhtar Donetsk ile karşılaşacak. Sports Park Radomlje 'de oynanacak müsabaka TSİ 18.30'da başlayacak. Beşiktaş'ın geçen hafta Hırvatistan ekibi Dinamo Zagreb ile oynamayı planladığı hazırlık maçı yoğun yağış nedeniyle iptal edilmişti. Yeni sezon hazırlıkları kapsamında şu ana kadar bir hazırlık maçı yapabilen siyah-beyazlılar, İstanbul etabında da Ümraniyespor 'la...

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Beşiktaş'tan Emirhan Topçu hamlesi
content: Beşıktaş 'ta transfer çalışmaları devam ederken önemli bir isim daha gündeme geldi. Savunmada yerli rotasyonunu güçlendirmek isteyen siyah beyazlılar, Çaykur Rizespor forması giyen Emirhan Topçu için çalışmalarını sıklaştırdı. 23 yaşındaki stoperi kadrosuna katmak isteyen Beşiktaş , Çaykur Rize ile görüşmeleri ilerletti. Genç futbolcu da Beşiktaş'ta forma giymeye sıcak bakıyor SOL STOPER Sol stoper ve sol bek mevkiilerinde forma giyebilen Emirhan Topçu, Çaykur Rizespor...

title: Defansa joker
content: Trendyol Süper Lig 'in yeni ekiplerinden Göztepe , dört koldan transfer çalışmalarını sürdürüyor. Bulgar Teknik Direktörü Stanimir Stoilov 'un raporu doğrultusunda belirlediği isimlerle görüşmelerde bulunan sarı-kırmızılı kurmaylar, savunma için rotasını Belçika 'ya çevirdi. Göz-Göz, Zulte Waregem 'den Novatus Miroshi 'yi gündemine aldı ve transferde önemli bir mesafe kat etti. Oyuncunun kısa süre içerisinde İzmir 'e gelip resmi sözleşmeyi imzalayacağı öğrenildi....

title: İtalya’nın gözü İmmobile’de
content: Avrupa 'nın en çok dikkat çeken transferlerinden olan Ciro İmmobile , ülkesi İtalya 'da da ilgiyle izleniyor. İmmobile'nin Beşiktaş 'ta karşılanması, taraftarlar tarafından destek görmesi ve kariyerinde yeni bir sayfa açması olumlu karşılandı. EURO 2024 'te istenen performansı gösteremeyen İtalya Milli Takımı , 2026 Dünya Kupası yolunda güçlü bir forvete ihtiyaç duyuyor. İmmobile'nin de Beşiktaş'ta başarılı olması halinde İtalya'nın hücum gücüne katılabileceği...

title: Rakip Fehervar
content: Trendyol Süper Lig 'in yeni ekiplerinden Göztepe , yeni sezon hazırlıklarını Slovenya 'da sürdürmeye devam ediyor. Antrenmanların yanı sıra hazırlık maçlarına da çıkan Göztepe, bugün Macaristan takımı Fehervar FC ile karşı karşıya gelecek. Karşılaşmanın TSİ 11.30'da başlaması bekleniyor.

title: Sıra Trencin’de
content: Lask Linz (3-2) ve Düsseldorf 'a (5-2) kaybeden Galatasaray , yarın Slovakya ekibi Trencin 'le karşılaşacak. Ardından ilk etap kamp çalışmaları bitecek. 3 gün izin yapacak oyuncular, 22-27 Temmuz'da yine Avusturya 'nın Irdning bölgesinde toplanacak.

title: Faruk Ilgaz unutulmadı
content: Fenerbahçe eski başkanlarından Faruk Ilgaz 'ı unutmadı ve vefatının 10'uncu yılında sosyal medya hesabından şu mesajı paylaştı: "Görev süresi boyunca önemli başarılara imza atmış efsane başkanlarımızdan Faruk Ilgaz'ı vefatının 10. yılında saygı ve rahmetle anıyoruz."

title: Mbappe Real'de
content: İspanyol devi Real Madrid , PSG 'yle sözleşmesi sonra eren Fransız yıldız Kylian Mbappe ile 5 yıllık sözleşme imzaladı. Yeni sezonda 9 numaralı formayı giyecek olan Fransız yıldız hücumcu, müze turunun ardından Santiago Bernabeu 'da kendisini görmek için stadı dolduran taraftarları selamladı. 25 yaşındaki forvet, 85 bin taraftarın önünde resmen Real Madrid futbolcusu oldu. İDOLÜNÜ KOPYALADI İdolü olan Cristiano Ronaldo gibi Real'de 9 numarayı seçen, formadaki armayı öpen...

title: Filede kuralar çekildi
content: Voleybolda Türkiye'yi CEV Şampiyonlar Ligi 'nde temsil edecek Türk takımlarının rakipleri belirlendi. Kadınlarda Eczacıbaşı Dynavit B , VakıfBank C, Fenerbahçe Medicana da D Grubu'nda yer aldı. Erkeklerde ise Fenerbahçe Medicana B , Halkbank da D Grubu'nda mücadele edecek.

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Fenerbahçe'ye Joao Felix'ten üzen haber!
content: İspanyol basını, teknik direktör Jose Mourinho 'nun kadrosunda görmek istediği Joao Felix için görüşme yapıldığını ancak Atletico Madrid 'in istediği bonservis miktarının Fenerbahçe 'ye çok geldiğini duyurdu. Haberde; "Fenerbahçe'nin istenilen bonservis bedelini ödemesi imkansız" denildi.

title: Ferdi 40 milyon euro
content: E URO 2024'te değerine değer katan Ferdi Kadıoğlu 'nun talipleri her geçen gün artıyor... Arsenal , Newcastle United , Brighton , Atletico Madrid , Manchester United ve Juventus 'un ardından şimdi de Sevilla , 24 yaşındaki sol bek için harekete geçti. İspanyol basını, Endülüs ekibinin sarı-lacivertlilere 27 milyon euro bonservis önerdiğini ancak Fenerbahçe yönetiminin bu teklifi hiç düşünmeden reddettiğini yazdı. FAVORİ M.UNITED İtalyan medyası ise Juventus'un Ferdi...

title: Biyonik adam Edin Vişça
content: Fırtına'nın deneyimli yıldızı Edin Visça , Macaristan kampında yine en çok konuşulan isimlerin başında yer aldı. Uğurcan'ın yokluğunda kaptanlık görevi üstlenen Boşnak futbolcu tecrübesiyle ve bitmeyen enerjisiyle dikkat çekti. İdman kaçırmayan ve bütün programlara ilk önce gelen 34 yaşındaki yıldız, takım içindeki saygısını katladı. Genç oyuncular da Vişça'nın her adımını takip ediyor.

title: Meunier Lille ile anlaştı
content: Uzun zamandır gündemi meşgul eden Thomas Meunier'in takımdan ayrılışı kesinlik kazandı. Geçtiğimiz sezonun devre arasında Dortmund'dan bedelsiz olarak kadrosuna kattığı Belçikalı sağ bek ile 1.5 yıllık sözleşme imzalamıştı. Ancak tecrübeli futbolcunun sözleşmesinde 15 Temmuz tarihine kadar Avrupa kupalarında oynayan bir takımdan teklif getirmesi durumunda serbest kalır maddesi yer alıyordu. Ailesinin Trabzon 'a gelmek istemediğini gerekçe gösteren Meunier, dün gece saat...

title: Indore shocker: Gunman shoots at cashier, loots Rs 6.6 lakh from bank
content: INDORE : A masked gunman wearing a raincoat barged into a public sector bank in Scheme No. 54, fired a shot at the female cashier, shattering the plexiglass, and made off with over Rs 6.6 lakh on Tuesday afternoon. The robber seems to have recced the bank and his getaway route as the robbery took less than four minutes and he used narrow lanes and bylanes to speed away on a motorcycle. The brazen dacoity has shocked the city, more so since the bank is in a busy street in a residential area....

title: Kozlowski sürprizi
content: İngiliz ekibi Brighton 'ın 2.5 yıl önce 11 milyon euro'ya aldığı Polonyalı orta saha Kozlowski 'ye Gaziantep FK yolunda. İtalyan gazeteci Romano'nun haberine göre; kırmızı-siyahlılarla İngilizler arasında anlaşmaya varılmak üzere. 20 yaşındaki genç maestro, geçen sezon kiralık oynadığı Hollanda ekibi Vitesse 'de 33 maçta 3 gol, 5 asist yaptı.

title: Kartal yüksekten uçar!
content: Güçlü bir hücum hattı oluşturan Beşiktaş'ta yıldızlar dikkat çekiyor. Dünyaca ünlü oyuncular Rafa Silva ve Ciro İmmobile'nin takıma katılması taraftarlarını ayağa kaldıran siyah beyazlı, mevcut kadroda yer alan genç futbolcularıyla da öne çıkıyor. Semih Kılıçsoy ve Ernest Muçi gibi gelecek vaat eden isimlere sahip Kartal, şimdiden yeni sezon öncesi en merak edilen takım olarak göze çarpıyor. Özellikle Rafa Silva-İmmobile ikilisi en merak edilen yıldızlar olarak...

title: Roma bir günde inşa edilmedi
content: Galatasaray 'ın Fildişi Sahilli yıldızı Wilfried Zaha , dikkat çeken açıklamalar yaptı. Ajans 1095'e konuşan 31 yaşındaki oyuncu, bu sezon da takımda kalacağını belirtti. Zaha, "Kendimi şu an buraya vermiş durumdayım. Her zaman söylentiler olacaktır. Bir sonraki sezonun başlamasını sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum" dedi. Takıma uyum süreciyle ilgili de konuşan oyuncu, şunları söyledi: " Palace 'da çok yorucu bir dönem yaşamıştım, sakatlandıktan sonra çok acele ettim. Burada yüksek...

title: Transferi sabırsızlıkla bekleniyordu! Galatasaray'a Wendel müjdesi
content: Yeni sezon hazırlıklarını sürdüren Galatasaray'da transfer çalışmaları sürüyor.

title: Zagadou sesleri
content: Kartal 'da stoper hattına takviye arayışı sürüyor. Yerli ve yabancı birçok adayı listesinde bulunduran siyah beyazlıar, Stuttgart 'ın Fransız stoperi Dan-Axel Zagadou 'yu da takip ediyor. Sol stoperde oynayan 25 yaşındaki futbolcunun, Alman kulübü Stuttgart ile 2026'ya kadar sözleşmesi bulunuyor.

title: Divan 27 Temmuz'da
content: Fenerbahçe Kulübü Yüksek Divan Kurulunun olağan toplantısı, 27 Temmuz Cumartesi gerçekleştirilecek. Sarı-lacivertli kulübün açıklamasına göre, Kalamış Fenerbahçe Faruk Ilgaz Tesisleri'nde gerçekleştirilecek toplantı saat 10.30'da başlayacak.

title: Google And Microsoft Now Consume More Power Than Several Large Countries
content: This massive energy usage underscores the significant environmental impact Tech giants Google and Microsoft each consumed 24 TWh of electricity in 2023, surpassing the consumption of more than 100 countries, new research claims. Analysis by Michael Thomas, shared on X, states that both Google and Microsoft used the same amount of energy as Azerbaijan, which has a GDP of $78.7 billion. In 2023, Google's revenue was $307.4 billion, and Microsoft's was $211.9 billion, Tech Radar reported. This...

Reform: Notfallversorgung soll besser werden
content: BERLIN (dpa-AFX) - Das Bundeskabinett bringt an diesem Mittwoch eine Reform der Notfallversorgung von Deutschlands Patientinnen und Patienten auf den Weg. Nach der Vorlage von Bundesgesundheitsminister Karl Lauterbach (SPD) soll es künftig eine stärkere Steuerung der Hilfesuchenden je nach Dringlichkeit des Anliegens geben. Dazu sollen zentrale Stellen in Kliniken eingerichtet werden. Auch die telefonische Einschätzung zur Dringlichkeit des Falls der Patientinnen und Patienten soll stark...

title: エマ・ロバーツ、コーディ・ジョンと婚約

content: が、2年前から交際しているコーディ・ジョンと婚約した。7月16日(現地時間)、エマは左手薬指にダイヤモンドのリングをはめて、コーディと一緒に笑顔を見せるツーショット写真をインスタグラムに投稿。「ママが言う前にここに載せます」とハートの絵文字を添えて綴り、婚約を発表した。 実はエマの母ケリー・カニンガムは、今年初めにエマと元夫 との間に生まれた3歳の息子ローズの姿を娘に知らせずインスタグラムに投稿していた。これを受け、「ママが息子の顔を勝手に投稿しても、2人とも愛しているからいい」とインスタグラム・ストーリーに投稿し、母が撮影した息子の写真をシェアしていた。 「 」によると、ネイサン・フィロン主演のドラマ「ザ・ルーキー...

content: 처음으로 아메리칸리그를 떠나 내셔널리그 올스타로 경기를 치른 오타니가 소감을 전했다. 오타니는 17일(한국시간) 미국 텍사스주 알링턴의 글로브라이프필드에서 열린 올스타 게임을 마친 뒤 가진 인터뷰에서 “경기를 치르고 그 경기에서 안타를 쳤다는 것이 가장 기억에 남는다”며 알링턴에서 보낸 지난 이틀을 떠올렸다. 이날 내셔널리그의 2번 지명타자로 선발 출전한 오타니는 2타수 1안타(1홈런) 1득점 3타점 1볼넷 1삼진 기록했다. 3회초 무사 1,...

title: Венгрия скрестила пальцы за победу Трампа, заявил Сийярто
content: ООН, 17 июл - ПРАЙМ. Венгрия скрестила пальцы за бывшего президента Соединенных Штатах Дональда Трампа на предстоящих выборах главы государства с учетом того, что при нем отношения двух стран были на высоте, заявил РИА Новости министр иностранных дел и внешнеэкономических связей Венгрии Петер Сийярто. "Безусловно, мы скрещиваем пальцы за победу президента Трампа. Но мы не американские граждане, так что не думаю, что это имеет значение. Я полагаю, что у нас есть право скрестить пальцы", -...

title: Latest News | Another Batch of Pilgrims Leaves for Amarnath Yatra
content: Jammu, Jul 17 (PTI) A fresh batch of 3,700 pilgrims left for the Amarnath cave shrine in South Kashmir Himalayas on Wednesday amidst tight security measures. The 20th batch of pilgrims left at 3:05 am in 127 vehicles under CRPF escort from Bhagwati Nagar base camp. The group included 2,734 men, 952 women and nine children. Of these, 2,305 pilgrims opted for the traditional 48-km Pahalgam route, while 1,435 chose the shorter but steeper 14-km Baltal route, they said. The 52-day yatra, which...

title: Mukuru Kwa Njenga Murders: Families Identify Victims as Police Detain Two More Suspects
content: The prime suspect in the Mukuru kwa Njenga murders, Collins Jumaisi Khalusha, was yesterday arraigned at the Makadara Law Courts. The court granted investigators 30 days of custodial orders to complete their investigations into the case. In a related development, the family of Roselyn Akoth Ogongo, one of the victims, identified her body at the Nairobi Funeral Home (City Mortuary) on Monday. They also witnessed the autopsy process conducted at the same facility. On Tuesday, the family visited...

creator: GARY D. ROBERTSON
content: RALEIGH, N.C. — North Carolina's election board voted Tuesday to certify a political party that wants to put Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on the state's presidential ballot this fall. The panel rejected a similar petition effort by a group backing Cornel West, citing questions about how signatures were collected. After weeks of reviewing the signature drives, the board voted 4-1 to recognize the We The People party that supporters of Kennedy, an author and environmental lawyer, are using as a vehicle...

title: Британские ученые выяснили, что когнитивные способности "сов" выше
content: Они изучили результаты 26 тыс. человек, проходивших тесты на интеллект, способность к рассуждению, время реакции и память, после чего сравнили результаты со средней продолжительностью сна участников, его качеством и хронотипом (временем, когда мы чувствуем себя наиболее бодрыми и продуктивными). В итоге обнаружилось, что "совы" набрали больше баллов в заданиях на оценку когнитивных функций по сравнению с "жаворонками". title: 以衝浪經驗比喻AI風險 蕭美琴:政府做大家往前衝的後盾
content: 副總統蕭美琴表示,在AI產業路上,政府做大家往前衝的後盾。(記者王憶紅攝) 〔記者王憶紅/台北報導〕副總統蕭美琴今日出席「2024創新論壇-智慧驅動點亮永續之島」中指出,疫後全球面對很多新的挑戰、衝擊,但台灣產業政策走在對的路上,尤其是AI產業,台灣在全球扮演關鍵性角色,雖然在AI浪潮上,未來也有不可知的風險,但政府會做大家往前衝的後盾。 蕭美琴表示,疫情後,國際政經局勢的變化非常快速,不管是烏俄戰爭、全球性通膨、近日美國政治的戲劇性的變化等等,讓全球的經濟都不斷面臨挑戰、變化,台灣在全球扮演供應鏈、整體安全關鍵角色,也受到新的衝擊,但幸運的是,我們的政策走在對的路上。 請繼續往下閱讀... 蕭美琴說,相對其他先進國家,這幾年我們的經濟表現是穩定,也受到更多國家的重視,前一陣子,全球的AI產業龍頭齊聚在臺灣,更展現了臺灣跟世界接軌,以及臺灣在全球科技供應鏈上,所扮演及發揮的關鍵角色。...

title: DSE2024|英皇書院超級狀元 冀留港升讀醫科懸壺濟世
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 中學文憑試(DSE)今日放榜,誕生10名狀元,其中8名狀元為考獲8科5**的超級狀元。英皇書院葉劭源成為其中一位「超級狀元」,分別在中英文、數學、生物、化學、物理及M2取得7科5星星的優越成績。 葉劭源坦言成績超乎意料,為自己感到驕傲。他表示未有外地升學的打算,更想留在香港就讀醫科,沒有偏好個別院校,待與父母商討後再選校,將來希望成為一位醫生救急扶危,回饋社會。 記者 梁佩施 相關新聞: DSE放榜2024—一文睇清今屆八間「狀元搖籃」 10名尖子身份陸續曝光! DSE放榜2024—喇沙書院誕兩狀元 其中一名超級狀元將赴英修讀經濟金融及數據科學 DSE放榜2024|16歲跳級生成「榜眼」 冀升讀港大法學理學雙學位 為弱勢社群發聲 DSE放榜2024|學友社建議考獲邊緣分數同學要做兩手準備 青協兩日接近800宗求助或查詢 DSE放榜2024—考生為「好意頭」手持星島日報等放榜 寓意「升到」大學 DSE放榜2024|香港紅十字會雅麗珊郡主學校有考生取得5科25分佳績 DSE放榜2024|李家超勉考生 未來充滿機會定能創造美好將來

title: Dengue cases in Karnataka cross 10,000 mark
creator: Express News Service
content: BENGALURU: Total dengue cases in Karnataka have breached the 10,000 mark touching 10,449 cases. On Tuesday, the state recorded 487 fresh cases. The total cases of hospitalised patients are highest in BBMP limits with 141, followed by 23 each from Mandya and Tumakuru, and 19 in Dharwad. title: Дипломат Полищук: США дали Зеленскому карт-бланш на удары по территории РФ
content: По словам российского дипломата, Вашингтон продолжает "раскручивать спираль эскалации". "Там пытаются оправдать собственные преступления и выгородить Киев. Более того, режиму Зеленского дают карт-бланш на нанесение американским оружием новых ударов по российской территории", - отметил Полищук. Дипломат добавил, что США рассчитывают нанести России "стратегическое поражение", а затем "отсидеться в безопасности за океаном". title: Трамп проведет митинг в Мичигане спустя неделю после покушения
creator: Марина Совина
content: Кандидат в президенты Соединенных Штатов Дональд Трамп в субботу, 20 июля, планирует провести новый митинг в штате Мичиган. Мероприятие состоится спустя всего лишь неделю после покушения на политика, пишет ТАСС . Кроме того, как сообщили в избирательном штабе Трампа, вместе с ним на митинге выступит и кандидат в вице-президенты Джей Ди Вэнс. Напомним, в субботу, 13 июля на Дональда Трампа было совершено покушение во время его выступления на предвыборном митинге в Пенсильвании. Бывший...

title: 北市聯醫仁愛院區照服員疑院內吸毒 警揪出識別證卡套藏K毒
content: 37歲的鄭姓長照照服員(右),因常常工作時恍神,被院內護理長懷疑吸毒。(記者鄭景議翻攝) 〔記者鄭景議/台北報導〕北市聯醫仁愛院區一名37歲的鄭姓長照照服員,因常常工作時恍神,被院內護理長懷疑吸毒,昨日通報大安分局警方,警方到場發現照服員的員工識別證卡套內,藏有一包1.1公克K他命,於是將鄭男依毒品罪嫌帶回偵辦。 據了解,鄭男擔任照顧長照病患的照服員工作,日前就不時出現在院內工作時恍神現象,護理長發現後,覺得鄭男形跡可疑,質問鄭男是否吸毒,儘管鄭男否認,但護理長還是發現鄭男鼻子周遭常有白色不明粉末,於是報警處理。 警方到場後,鄭男仍然不斷否認,表示沒有施用毒品,但院方人員表示他應該今日才施用過,現在只是把鼻子附近的粉末擦去,警方在細心檢查下,果然發現鄭男藏有一包1.1公克K他命。 大安分局也呼籲,為杜絕醫院犯罪行為,警局與轄內醫療院所均有建立安全通報網,嚴格加強安全防護,維護民眾看診權益。 警方到場發現照服員的員工識別證卡套內,藏有一包1.1公克k他命,於是將鄭男依毒品罪嫌帶回偵辦。 (記者鄭景議翻攝) 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Новиков: «К сожалению, Кузнецов до конца себя не раскрыл»
content: Заслуженный тренер России Юрий Новиков считает, что в последние годы игры в «Вашингтоне» российский форвард Евгений Кузнецов потерял радость от хоккея. «Мне посчастливилось быть в одной команде на МЧМ-2011 с ребятами, которые сделали историю и мою биографию. title: New footage shows 'uncontacted' Mashco Piro tribe in Peruvian Amazon under threat of logging
creator: Kaitlin Easton
content: In short: Rare new footage and images show more than 50 Mashco Piro people close to a number of logging concessions in the Peruvian Amazon. Human rights organisations say the rare glimpse of the uncontacted tribe is a result of logging pushing them out of the forest. What's next? Survival International is calling on the Forest Stewardship Council to withdraw its certification of logging company Canales Tahuamanu's operations. title: Василий Анохин: смоленский бизнес первым в стране получил федеральные земли без торгов
content: Смоленская область стала первым регионом России, где бизнес получил федеральные земельные участки в рамках программы импортозамещения в упрощённом порядке. Две компании из Смоленской области получили земельные участки в аренду без проведения торгов. ООО «Птицефабрика «Сметанино» арендовала более 2,5 тысяч гектаров земли в Смоленском районе для реализации инвестиционного проекта по развитию растениеводства. title: 相隔24年《夏日的麼麼茶》男女主角重逢!鄭秀文虧爆任賢齊
content: 鄭秀文(右)開唱,任賢齊前往欣賞捧場。(翻攝自IG) 〔記者陳慧玲/台北報導〕香港天后「Sammi」鄭秀文近期正在紅館開唱,除了前幾天老公許志安現身當嘉賓嗨翻全場,24年前曾和她一起演出電影《夏日的麼麼茶》男主角任賢齊也來了,雖是坐在台下觀賞,但鄭秀文和他台上、台下合唱主題曲,再次掀起高潮。 任賢齊在社群分享他去觀看鄭秀文演唱會的花絮影片,鄭秀文跟歌迷說要找回集體回憶,談到20多年前曾拍過《夏日的麼麼茶》,現在男主角任賢齊來現場了,任賢齊則對著台上的鄭秀文獻飛吻,全場歡呼尖叫。 請繼續往下閱讀... 任賢齊唱電影主題曲還改歌詞說鄭秀文會愛上他。(翻攝自IG) 看到任賢齊的裝扮,鄭秀文虧他「好風騷」,穿粉紅色T恤,還戴上白框眼鏡,又穿牛仔外套,笑說就像當年他在電影裡的「麼麼茶」角色一樣,都沒有變。 聽到任賢齊講粵語,鄭秀文虧他說的粵語沒有進步,之後任賢齊和她合唱《浪花一朵朵》,任賢齊改歌詞唱到「Sammi你一定會愛上我」,唱完鄭秀文又虧任賢齊,唱到「浪花」歌詞好像唱成「老花」,逗笑全場歌迷。 鄭秀文在台上也一起合唱《浪花一朵朵》。(翻攝自IG)...

content: Jaringan fixed mobile covergence XL Axiata kini telah menjangkau wilayah Sulawesi. Sejak Maret 2024, jaringan XL SATU Fiber masuk ke kabupaten Morowali.
